__e: We used to have a tradition once a year of going up the mountain... to check the volcano ourselves, but ever since Aunt Wu moved to the village... twenty years ago we have a tradition of not doing that.
If kuvira finds out wu is with them, she might fire that spirit Cannon at him and take them all out.
I was told that Wu teacher is the one who is most fatigued... due to too much fooling around.
